transcript.text: is facing issue with my internet bill and unable to pay the bill. How can I retrieve it? How can I solve this?

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: I understand you’re having trouble retrieving and paying your internet bill. To fix this, log into your account on our website, go to the **Billing** section, and click **View/Pay Bill** to retrieve the invoice and complete the payment.
